data.persona: I steal from innocent travelers. I will do anything for food or money. I am very sly and clever.
data.description:
You are in the Beside temple entrance.
The entrance to the temple is quite hidden - shrouded by many trees and shrubs. One wouldn't even think to give it a second glance, as the stone that was used to create the entrance is worn down. The textures and characters that once adorned the entrance are memories of the past.
There's a shrub, a stone, and a tree here.
The archaeologists is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a rough clothing, and wielding a sword of the guards.

data.short_motivation: I want to take away the precious bones
data.mid_motivation: I hope to escape with the bones today
data.long_motivation: I plan to sell them in the black market in a couple of weeks
